{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR2000 |revision=v4 |asin= |fcc_date=12/10/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY312300212 |ic_id=4054A-12300212 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Router}} "2976390403" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Presumed MX25L3206EM2I-12G 4MB Flash {{WiFiCert|WFA18208|04/10/2013}} *[https://kb.netgear.com/23897/Comparison-between-different-versions-of-WNR2000 Comparison between different versions of WNR2000] ===Specifications=== 
Model		WNR2000v1	WNR2000v2	WNR2000v3	WNR2000v4	WNR2000v5
Power		12V/1A		12V/1A		12V/1A		12V/1A		12V/1A
Processor	Atheros		Broadcom 	Atheros		Atheros		Qualcomm
CPU Chip	AR9132		BCM4716B0	AR7240		AR9341		QCA9531
Freq		(400MHz)	(300MHz) 	(400MHz) 	(500MHz) 	(650MHz)
Flash Memory	4MB		4MB		4MB		4MB		4MB
RAM Memory	32MB		32MB		32MB		32MB		32MB
Wireless	B/G/N		B/G/N		B/G/N		B/G/N		B/G/N
WLAN		Atheros		Broadcom	Atheros		Atheros		Qualcomm
Chip		AR9132/AR9103	BCM4716B0	AR9287		AR9341		QCA9531
Switch		Atheros		Broadcom	Atheros		Atheros		Qualcomm
Chip		AR8216		BCM5325E	AR7240		AR9341		QCA9531
LAN Speed	10/100		10/100		10/100		10/100		10/100
LAN Ports	4		4		4		4		4
WAN Ports	1		1		1		1		1
